name: purslane
content:

a succulent plant (= one that holds a lot of water) whose leaves are used as a herb and in salads: Purslane is a seasonal herb, available only in spring and summer. To make this salad, you need fresh herbs (parsley, mint, and purslane) as well as toasted pitta bread.
